Honey: Honey has antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties, making it a natural remedy for soothing a sore throat and relieving cough symptoms.
Vitamin C: Vitamin C is an antioxidant that helps boost the immune system and protect against illness. Taking high doses of vitamin C can help reduce the severity and duration of a cold.
Eucalyptus oil: Eucalyptus oil has natural decongestant properties and can help clear blocked nasal passages. It can be added to hot water and inhaled as a steam, or applied directly to the nose.

Garlic: Garlic has antimicrobial and antiviral properties, making it a natural remedy for fighting off cold viruses. It can be added to food orine to help boost the immune system and reduce inflammation.
